column2: You feel your very being dividing!\nImmune to personal larpa temporarily.
column10: 你感觉自己的存在正在被分裂！\n暂时免疫拉帕附身。

column2: When attacked, you will retaliate with a stored spell!
column10: 你被攻击时会以一个储存的法术反击！

column2: You have been detained. Await your sentence at the end of Time.
column10: 你被拘留了。在时间的尽头等待你的判决。

column2: After a delay, deals 15 damage for each stack and removes all stacks.
column10: 短暂延迟后，每层造成15伤害并移除所有层数。
你的投射物获得$0点冰系伤害。
你的投射物获得$0暴击几率。
